column1: Little Goat Diner////I have been to this restaurant MULTIPLE times and it never fails to impress me.  First off
column2: the coffee here is great - deep roasted flavor that isn't bitter and tastes good with or without milk/cream.  Secondly
column4: just have it with a side of hash browns.  Trust me.  They're delicious
column6: crispy and aren't in the least bit soggy.  I've ordered the corned beef hash twice and that's amazing.  My boyfriend has ordered the Fat Elvis
column7: which wasn't overwhelming in the PB flavor but had a nice creaminess to the dish.
